src:
Ajukan Sekda DKI Saefullah Jadi Cawagub, Gerindra: Dia Mumpuni
07 Nov 2019, 22:18 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Satu dari empat nama yang diusulkan oleh Gerindra sebagai calon Wakil Gubernur DKI Jakarta kepada PKS adalah Sekretaris Daerah (Sekda) DKI Jakarta Saefullah. Sekda dianggap memiliki pengalaman birokrasi.
"Kita kan objektif saja, menurut kita yang memadai, yang dari luar kita terima juga. Sekda kan mumpunilah jadi wagub," ucap Ketua DPD Gerindra DKI Jakarta, Muhammad Taufik, saat dihubungi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
M Taufik ingin mengusulkan calon dari dalam dan luar partai. Karena itu, Saefullah-lah yang dipilih.
"Urusan kita ngomong ini nama dari dalam, terus siapa nama dari luar, kita bilang Sekda saja," kata Taufik.
Meski sudah memberikan surat usulan nama kepada PKS, Taufik mengaku belum berkomunikasi dengan Saefullah. Dia malah berkelakar, semoga Saefullah tidak marah.
"Saya belum ngomong ke Sekda. Mudah-mudahan nggak marah doi, jangan dipikir gue jorokin gitu," kata Taufik.


M Taufik (Dwi Andayani/detikcom)
text:
Ask a Regional Secretary of DKI Saefullah to Be Cawagub, Gerindra: He is Qualified
Nov 7 2019, 22:18 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - One of the four names proposed by Gerindra as a candidate for Deputy Governor of DKI Jakarta to PKS is the Regional Secretary (Sekda) of DKI Jakarta Saefullah. Regional Secretary is considered to have bureaucratic experience.
"We're just being objective, according to us, who are adequate, which we also receive from the outside. The Regional Secretary is capable of becoming a Deputy Governor," said Chairman of DKI Jakarta Gerindra DPD, Muhammad Taufik, when contacted on Thursday (11/07/2019).
M Taufik wants to propose candidates from inside and outside the party. Therefore, Saefullah was chosen.
"Our business says this is the name from the inside, then who is the name from the outside, we just say Regional Secretary," said Taufik.
Despite giving a letter of name proposal to PKS, Taufik admitted that he had not communicated with Saefullah. He even joked, hopefully Saefullah not angry.
"I have not talked to the Regional Secretary. Hopefully I am not angry, don't think I'm dirty," said Taufik.


M Taufik (Dwi Andayani / detikcom)
